cause.description:
Mike Vick deseveres to have a knewce put around his neck anyway. In mi idea the pay per view money could go to a charitey, that shopuld be sufficent for the 50 or so dead dogs they found baried in his backyard. On the other hand I wouldn't mind if they shot him in one of the giant canons, to afganistan if possible, or asia they treat diopgs the same way as Vick maybe he'll fit in over there.
1. Any dog even a shit-shu is more valuable then Mike Vick.
2. I bet we would make a ton of money if we had Vick fight Pac man Jones or Tank Johnson.
3. don't they have some other kind opf entertiment in Virgina, it seems like if you don't have a sister to fuck you don't have anything to do.
4. One other idea was put vick in the dog fight with a dog...
cause.mission: To substiute Idiot Nfl players for dogs and fight them. Bathing the winner in a warm meal killing the loser by any means nescisary.
cause.name: Vick fighting, replacing pitbulls with over paid athletes.
